001package net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.loss;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.patterns.DomainObject;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.common.patterns.MarkerInterface;
005
006/**
007 * Marker interface for all types of loss functions.
008 *
009 * <p>
010 * A {@code LossFunction} defines the contract for calculating error or
011 * "loss" between estimated (predicted) values and target (expected) values
012 * in the context of optimization, training, or evaluation.
013 */
014@DomainObject
015@MarkerInterface
016public interface LossFunction {
017}
